Task 6 (8 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 6: 20 minutes

You need to complete an advert for the new business.

Click the buttons below to download the files Advert and Mobile Phone Image.

Save a copy of each file in the Section 2 subfolder you created.

a) Open the Advert file. Change the background colour in the advert template (the blue shape) to Yellow. (1 mark)

b) Open the Mobile Phone Image. Format the image so that the picture colour is Grayscale. (1 mark)

c) Crop the Mobile Phone Imageto show the hand holding the mobile phone only. (2 marks)

d) Insert the cropped image into the advert tempate (the shape), resizing it so that it appears in the top half. of the shape only. When resizing the image, the proportions of the image must be maintained. (1 mark)

e) Add the following text, as a caption above the image. (2 marks)

Help at Hand!

f) Insert the following text into the advert template (the shape). The text must be below the image. The text must be formatted so that it is centre-aligned, bold, and font size 14. (1 mark)

  • Call us for all your DIY needs
  • Available 9am until 6pm Monday to Friday
  • Mobile: 08943892299

Save your finished Advert file.

Upload your finished Advert file by using the Upload button below.

Advert Phone Image

When you have finished Task 6 press Next.
